extension.description: A VS Code extension for cleaning up Git branches (detect and delete dead/stale/gone branches, with full branch management).
command.openCleaner.title: Git Branch Cleaner: Open
config.title: Git Branch Cleaner
config.baseBranch.description: Base branch used for dead-branch detection. If 'auto', prefers origin/HEAD, then tries main/master/develop.
config.protectedBranches.description: Protected branches excluded from delete/detect/rename/merge-source actions. Supports glob patterns with *.
config.confirmBeforeDelete.description: Show confirmation dialog before destructive actions.
config.includeRemoteInDeadCleanup.descri: When bulk deleting dead branches, also try to delete corresponding remote branches.
config.staleDays.description: Number of days since last commit to consider a branch as stale.
config.autoFetchPrune.description: Automatically run 'git fetch --prune' before detecting gone branches.
config.showStatusBadges.description: Show status badges (merged/stale/gone) in the branch list.
No Git repository found. Open a folder o: No Git repository found. Open a folder or initialize Git.
A branch name cannot end with '.' or '/': A branch name cannot end with '.' or '/'.
Merging a branch into itself is not allo: Merging a branch into itself is not allowed.
Protected branches cannot be selected as: Protected branches cannot be selected as the merge source.
Protected branches cannot be deleted rem: Protected branches cannot be deleted remotely.
Name: Name
HEAD: HEAD
{0} branches are not fully merged. Force: {0} branches are not fully merged. Force delete them?
Also delete {0} remote branches with sam: Also delete {0} remote branches with same name (not tracked)?
